remarks: The preimage of a Cartesian product is the intersection of the preimages of each component function.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Jun-2017.)
statement: xppreima $p |- ( ( Fun F /\ ran F C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) -> ( `' F " ( Y X. Z ) ) = ( ( `' ( 1st o. F ) " Y ) i^i ( `' ( 2nd o. F ) " Z ) ) ) $.
